@@ -6,16 +6,5 @@
   plugins: [react()],
   optimizeDeps: {
     exclude: ['lucide-react'],
   },
-  server: {
-    host: true, // Allow external access
-    port: 5173,
-    allowedHosts: [
-      'localhost',
-      '127.0.0.1',
-      '.ngrok-free.app', // Allow all ngrok-free.app subdomains

-    ],
-    cors: true, // Enable CORS
-  },
 });

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -6,5 +6,16 @@
   plugins: [react()],
   optimizeDeps: {
     exclude: ['lucide-react'],
   },
+  server: {
+    host: true, // Allow external access
+    port: 5173,
+    allowedHosts: [
+      'localhost',
+      '127.0.0.1',
+      '.ngrok-free.app', // Allow all ngrok-free.app subdomains
+      'ce3df4640f22.ngrok-free.app', // Your specific ngrok host
+    ],
+    cors: true, // Enable CORS
+  },
 });
